content.text: I just moved to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams!
Oh wow! That sounds amazing! What kind of culinary dreams are you pursuing?
I want to open my own bakery!
That's awesome! I love baking too! What's your favorite thing to bake?
I love making wedding cakes! I think they're so beautiful and intricate.
Wedding cakes are beautiful! I'm not very good at decorating cakes, but I love eating them!
I'm sure you're better than you think! I love trying new recipes and baking different things.
Me too! I just got a new George Foreman grill and I'm excited to try some new recipes on it.
I love that grill! I use mine all the time. What are you thinking about making first?
I'm thinking about making some chicken fajitas. What do you like to make on your grill?
I love making hamburgers on mine! They're so easy and delicious.
Hamburgers are delicious! I love them with all the fixings.
Me too! I could eat them every day.
Me too! We should have a cookout sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to have a cookout with you.
Great! We can make all the food we want.
That sounds like a plan! I'm excited
